clearplot
hold on
t = 0:0.01:20;
v = -10 + 8 * exp(-t);
plot(t, v, 'b')
plot([0.0, 0.5, 1.0, 1.5, 2.0, 2.5, 3.0, 3.5, 4.0, 4.5, 5.0, 5.5, 6.0, 6.5, 7.0, 7.5, 8.0, 8.5, 9.0, 9.5, 10.0, 10.5, 11.0, 11.5, 12.0, 12.5, 13.0, 13.5, 14.0, 14.5, 15.0, 15.5, 16.0, 16.5, 17.0, 17.5, 18.0, 18.5, 19.0, 19.5, 20.0], [-2.0, -5.166666666666666, -7.079861111111111, -8.201274353780864, -8.890585806471167, -9.318154834407329, -9.581145374865475, -9.742538318591986, -9.841721792732777, -9.90270668051425, -9.940195953969903, -9.963239127194644, -9.977403338189777, -9.986110022396307, -9.991461961335832, -9.994751745741027, -9.996773945071094, -9.998016973010145, -9.998781051198593, -9.999250723164021, -9.999539426280029, -9.999716889484219, -9.999825974517254, -9.999893028104035, -9.999934245339528, -9.999959581202754, -9.999975154929567, -9.999984727959097, -9.99999061241408, -9.999994229535531, -9.999996452947492, -9.999997819658788, -9.999998659763905, -9.99999917616895, -9.999999493598478, -9.999999688719548, -9.99999980865871, -9.999999882384234, -9.999999927702648, -9.999999955559469, -9.999999972682806], 'r')
